summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Parcel "A" of Short Plat 80-192; Vacated 25th Avenue West; Section 21, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Perkins First Addition to Richmond Highlands; Parcel "C" of City of Seattle Short Plat 83-591; Parcel 1 of King county Short Plant No. 583116; Tract "X", King County Short Plat No. 579072; Parcel "A" and "B" of King county Short Plat 80-182; Section 7, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
